title: Soccer 3d Lite Watch Face
summary: Amazing Free 3D Soccer Watch Face to all Football Fans! Analog / Digital Style.
description: To every Football / Soccer Fan all over the world! Watch Face made from a Fan to all Footbal / Soccer lovers! The best Watch Face for Euro 2016! Amazing rotated full 3D Match Ball right at your wrist! Eye catching animation and beautiful waving flag of France in background. Analog and Digital version with lots of settings to choose from. Enjoy Next Level's Watch Faces!Features :★ Beautiful animated watch face with 2 match balls to choose from. Choose from analog and digital version.★ 2 football / soccer match balls: well-known Telstar Match Ball and Ball with all the countries played in Euro 2016!★ Mobile and wear app.★ Battery Indicator Module.★ Lots of options to choose from. Personalize your Watch Face!★ Different settings for Analog and Digital Watch Face.★ More amazing improvements still to come.This is a free version of the app. If you want to to have realistic, official Match Balls from World Cups or Euro - please download Football 3D World Watch Face from my repository. Soccer 3d Lite Watch Face a amazing Animated Watch Face with beautiful rotating match ball. This is a perfect choice for your Android Wear Device. Realistic effect. Easy install and modify.Great Watch Face for all kinds of partys, travel, events, meetings and everywhere you go! Great for big events, like Euro 2016 ! Easy startup and lots of settings to choose from. How to use the app?- This is an app dedicated for Android Wear Devices. - Just download the app. - Wait 2-10 minutes for full installation of the package.- Open Android Wear in your smartphone and sync watch face it with the watch. - The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.- Tap once to start animation (you can switch Tap to Start / Stop Animation to use Continuous Animation in Settings).- You can change settings on Mobile app, or drectly on your Android Wear device.If you spot something wrong please feedback me - app will be updated frequently.
descriptionHTML:
To every Football / Soccer Fan all over the world! Watch Face made from a Fan to all Footbal / Soccer lovers! The best Watch Face for Euro 2016! Amazing rotated full 3D Match Ball right at your wrist! Eye catching animation and beautiful waving flag of France in background. Analog and Digital version with lots of settings to choose from.

Enjoy Next Level's Watch Faces!

Features :
★ Beautiful animated watch face with 2 match balls to choose from. Choose from analog and digital version.
★ 2 football / soccer match balls: well-known Telstar Match Ball and Ball with all the countries played in Euro 2016!
★ Mobile and wear app.
★ Battery Indicator Module.
★ Lots of options to choose from. Personalize your Watch Face!
★ Different settings for Analog and Digital Watch Face.
★ More amazing improvements still to come.

This is a free version of the app. If you want to to have realistic, official Match Balls from World Cups or Euro - please download Football 3D World Watch Face from my repository.

Soccer 3d Lite Watch Face a amazing Animated Watch Face with beautiful rotating match ball. This is a perfect choice for your Android Wear Device. Realistic effect. Easy install and modify.

Great Watch Face for all kinds of partys, travel, events, meetings and everywhere you go! Great for big events, like Euro 2016 ! Easy startup and lots of settings to choose from.

How to use the app?
- This is an app dedicated for Android Wear Devices.
- Just download the app.
- Wait 2-10 minutes for full installation of the package.
- Open Android Wear in your smartphone and sync watch face it with the watch.
- The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.
- Tap once to start animation (you can switch Tap to Start / Stop Animation to use Continuous Animation in Settings).
- You can change settings on Mobile app, or drectly on your Android Wear device.

If you spot something wrong please feedback me - app will be updated frequently.
comments: Interesting but.. Can you add some way of customize the flags?
recentChanges: ★ You can now individually change colors to desired one of almost every element of the Watch Face:
Analog: change hands second, date and ticks (normal and ambient mode)
Digital: change time, date (normal and ambient mode)
★ You can now switch from graphical and simple watch face hands.
★ Added Graphical Ticks (switch it "on" in WatchFace "Settings").
★ You can change main font to a different one.
